name: Rong
description:
Rong is Round Pong, a single-player Pong variant. You try to keep the ball away from the blue zone as long as possible. Made for MiniLD #72.

For some reason, sound in the online version is bad.

Controls:

Space: Start

Esc: Quit

Right: Rotate clockwise

Left: Rotate counter-clockwise

F: Turn FX on/off

M: Turn Music on/off
